EngageManifest.Title: News
EngageManifest.Description:
Displays the image and content stacked above a pager. The total wdth of the content and image will be 100% of your content area (or pane).

The pager images appear at the bottom in a horizontal row with a light blue background applied. The selected slides pager will be indicated with a darker blue background with an arrow pointing up at the content above. For best results make pager images proportionate to themselves, as well as to the width of the area and number of slides used.
